tags: Scores 1.0 if a known NIP-05 identifier resolves to the target pubkey (fixed nip05 string for deterministic planning).
content:
plan
  meta = do 'nostr.query' {kinds: [0], authors: [_.targetPubkey], limit: 1}
in then
  events = meta | [],
  ev = first(events),
  profile = Data(fetch(ev, .content) | '{}'),
  nip05 = fetch(profile, .nip05) | null,
  nip05_res = do 'http.nip05_resolve' {nip05: nip05}
in
if nip05 == null then 0.0
else
  let
    res = nip05_res,
    resolved_pubkey = fetch(res, .pubkey) | null
  in
  if lower(resolved_pubkey | '') == lower(_.targetPubkey) then 1.0 else 0.0
